name: Wowie - Buzz Grove
description:
Time to go coin collecting in your small grove in the mountains... a buzzing friend will tag along and help out. 

Made for Wowie Jam 2.0 (Theme: Intentional Bugs)
Theme interpretation: a Companion Bug AI + a few game play 'bugs' made into puzzles  + the ending

You can see most of the development process here: https://www.twitch.tv/collections/SELG555l6xU4jw

Controls


ControllerKB/MouseMoveLeft Stick
WASDCameraRight Stick
MouseJumpSouth Button
SpaceInteractNorth ButtonR
Pet Action
West ButtonLeft Mouse
QuitStartESC
